sourcesContent:
import React from 'react'; import { ArrowLeft, Play, Pause, Volume2, SkipBack, SkipForward, Maximize, ThumbsUp, Share2, BookOpen } from 'lucide-react'; import { useNavigate } from 'react-router-dom'; const VideoMamalia = () => { const navigate = useNavigate(); const [isPlaying, setIsPlaying] = React.useState(true); const videos = [ { id: 1, title: "Kehidupan Singa di Alam Liar", duration: "10:25", thumbnail: "/api/placeholder/800/450", views: "1.2k", description: "Pelajari tentang kehidupan singa di habitat alaminya, bagaimana mereka berburu dan hidup dalam kelompok yang disebut pride. Video ini akan mengajarkan kita tentang perilaku sosial singa, cara berburu, dan cara mereka membesarkan anak-anak mereka." }, { id: 2, title: "Gajah Afrika: Sang Raksasa Cerdas", thumbnail: "/api/placeholder/400/225", views: "985", duration: "8:45" }, { id: 3, title: "Lumba-lumba: Mamalia Laut yang Mengagumkan", thumbnail: "/api/placeholder/400/225", views: "1.5k", duration: "12:30" } ]; return (
{/* Navigation Header */}
{/* Video Player Section */}
{/* Main Video Display */}
{/* Video Controls Overlay */}
{/* Progress Bar */}
{/* Control Buttons */}
3:45 / 10:25
{/* Video Info */}

{videos[0].title}

{videos[0].views} tayangan Dipublikasikan 2 hari yang lalu

{videos[0].description}

{/* Related Videos */}

Video Pembelajaran Lainnya

{videos.slice(1).map((video) => (
{video.duration}

{video.title}

{video.views} tayangan

))}
); }; export default VideoMamalia;
